segments.text: I peek in and notice the everyday bustle of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is focused on drying dishes, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the faucet is still running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is brimming over, water cascading to the floor!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, one foot in the growing pool of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the cabinet, a boy is on a stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting backâ€” that could be trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him reaches up, eyes on the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's kind of funny how sneaky they are, but risky too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden through the window adds a nice, calm backdrop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the water will reach the kids soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is oddly captivating in its mix of routine and mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor mom, she'll have a shock when she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR
